item.title: Renaming git branches from master to main
item.description: I was looking at the integration tests for Thoth GitHub repo and I get this warning: The default branch has been renamed! master is now named main If you have a local clone, you can update it by running the following commands. These are the commands (git tips): git branch -m master main git fetch origin git branch -u origin/main main git remote set-head origin -a In my case, as this is my upstream remote, I did:
